item.title: 价格大幅上涨的时代已经过去，美联储因此感到欣慰
item.description: Hobby Works 总裁迈克尔-布雷（Michael Brey）知道他的顾客对涨价已经忍无可忍，因此他正在囤积一些他认为人们会真正购买的价格较低的产品。在他位于马里兰州罗克维尔（Rockville）和劳雷尔（Laurel）的商店里，火车套件、遥控汽车和无人机等商品的涨价时代已经一去不复返了。【原文：Hobby Works President Michael Brey knows his customers are fed up with price increases, so he’s stocking up on less costly products he thinks people will actually go for. At his stores in Rockville and Laurel, Maryland, the pandemic-era days of passing on price hikes for items like train sets, remote-controlled cars and drones are over.】

item.title: 英国预算担忧促使企业主关闭公司以避免税收增加
item.description: 数以千计有偿付能力的英国企业主正在清算自己的公司，以避免预算案中对企业家征税的增加。【原文：Thousands of solvent UK business owners are winding up their companies, allowing them to avoid an expected increase in levies on entrepreneurs in the budget.】

item.title: 美国大选前欧元套期保值价格为2017年以来最高
item.description: 在美国总统大选前夕，欧元的相对套期保值成本是七年来最高的，因为民调显示投票将进入最后阶段。【原文：The relative cost of hedging the euro in the run-up to the US presidential elections is the most elevated in seven years as polls suggest voting will go down to the wire.】

item.title: 沙特石油出口收入降至三年多来最低点
item.description: 由于原油价格受到需求增长疲软的拖累，沙特阿拉伯的石油出口收入已跌至三年多来的最低点。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s revenue from oil exports has slumped to the lowest in more than three years as sluggish demand growth weighs on crude prices.】

item.title: 香港出售债券兑现人民币全球化承诺
item.description: 香港当局正在履行承诺，通过罕见地发行以人民币计价的债券，加强香港作为离岸人民币交易中心的作用。【原文：Authorities in Hong Kong are following through on a pledge to bolster the city’s role as an offshore yuan trading hub via a rare issuance of bonds denominated in the Chinese currency.】

item.title: 这些 ETF 为何在牛市中夭折
item.description:
在本期万亿节目中，我们将探讨一些基金是如何在最好的时代也遭遇挫折的。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, we examine how some funds managed to faceplant in the best of times.

】

item.title: 渣打银行称特朗普赌局左右美元涨势
item.description: 据渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）称，美元本月反弹的主要原因是，博彩市场越来越倾向于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中获胜。【原文：The dollar’s rally this month is largely being driven by betting markets increasingly pointing to a victory for Donald Trump in the US presidential election, according to Standard Chartered Plc.】

item.title: 普拉博沃通过军事训练营务虚会考验内阁
item.description: 印尼新内阁本周将举行一次军事风格的务虚会，前将军、总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）希望在领导团队为其任期的前 100 天制定计划时，对他们进行纪律和团队精神方面的培训。【原文：Indonesia’s new cabinet will undergo a military-style retreat this week as President Prabowo Subianto, a former general, aims to drill his leadership team with discipline and teamwork as they plan for the first 100 days of his term.】

item.title: 英国财政预算令私营部门增长降至 11 个月低点
item.description: 英国私营部门的增长速度降至近一年来最弱，此前企业受到下周预算警告和美国大选担忧的惊吓。【原文：Growth in Britain’s private sector cooled to its weakest in almost a year after businesses were spooked by warnings over next week’s budget and concerns about the US election.】

item.title: 意大利 Progetto 银行因贷款问题接受司法管理
item.description: 一名官员说，意大利金融警察已将 Progetto 银行置于司法管理之下，原因是该银行涉嫌向与犯罪组织有关联的个人和公司提供国家支持的贷款。【原文：Italy’s financial police has put Banca Progetto under judicial administration for allegedly having provided state-backed loans to people and companies linked to criminal organizations, an official said.】

item.title: 波兰顶级银行 PKO 寻求在新战略中保持创纪录的盈利能力
item.description: 波兰最大的贷款机构波兰 PKO 银行（PKO Bank Polski SA）希望在未来几年内保持创纪录的盈利能力，同时加快有机增长，包括扩大企业贷款。【原文：Poland’s largest lender PKO Bank Polski SA seeks to sustain its record profitability next years as it eyes acceleration of organic growth, including expansion in corporate loans.】

item.title: 银行与私人信贷如何成为最佳死敌
item.description:
金融领域的两大力量正在联手合作。【原文：

Two big forces in finance are teaming up.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：私人信贷与银行成为死敌（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：私人信贷与银行成为死敌（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Private Credit and Banks Become Frenemies (Podcast)】

item.title: 欧元区私营部门经济第二个月未实现增长
item.description: 欧元区私营部门活动的下滑趋势已持续到第二个月，该地区两大主要经济体的产出受到拖累，而且几乎没有复苏的迹象。【原文：The downtrend in private-sector activity in the euro-area extended into a second month with the region’s two top economies weighing on output and little sign of a recovery to come.】

item.title: 沙特王子的海滩派对彰显 Neom 梦想的真实性
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯举行旗舰投资会议的前几天，经过精挑细选的嘉宾们将首次领略到王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的万亿美元赌注：沙特王国的未来将超越石油。【原文：Days before Saudi Arabia kicks off its flagship investment conference, a handpicked selection of guests will get the first glimpse of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s trillion-dollar bet that the kingdom has a future beyond oil.】

item.title: 英特尔在欧盟法院10.6亿欧元反垄断诉讼中胜诉
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）在与欧盟的最新一轮史诗般的法律战中获胜，该案导致英特尔被处以 10.6 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的反垄断罚金，一度创下历史纪录。【原文：Intel Corp. won the latest round of an epic legal battle with the European Union over a case that led to a once-record antitrust fine of €1.06 billion ($1.1 billion).】

item.title: 中国 CATL 推出专为混合动力汽车设计的电池
item.description: 中国当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.中国当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司周四发布了一款专为混合动力汽车设计的新型电池，旨在让更多的司机不再使用耗油量大的汽车。【原文：China’s Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. on Thursday unveiled a new battery designed for hybrid vehicles in an effort to wean more drivers off gasoline-guzzling cars.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行杠杆融资账面损失 8,500 万英镑
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，在努力摆脱部分债务后，该公司第三季度录得与杠杆融资组合相关的损失 8,500 万英镑。【原文：Barclays Plc said it recorded £85 million in losses tied to its leveraged finance portfolio in the third quarter after it struggled to get rid of some of the debt.】

item.title: 德国商业低迷有所缓解，但法国经济仍在挣扎
item.description: 欧元区两个最大经济体的商业活动本月继续萎缩，尽管德国出现了生机勃勃的迹象，可能预示着本季度将恢复增长。【原文：Business activity in the euro area’s two biggest economies kept shrinking this month, though signs of life in Germany could herald a return to growth this quarter.】

item.title: 交易员为欧洲央行 12 月降息半点争论不休
item.description: 交易员们对欧洲央行是否会在 12 月份降息半个百分点的问题争论不休。【原文：Traders are going back and forth over whether the European Central Bank will deliver a half-point interest-rate cut in December.】

item.title: 欧洲股市因各行业盈利报告向好而上涨
item.description: 在连续三天下跌之后，一系列公司的良好盈利报告提振了市场，欧洲股市随之上涨。【原文：European stocks rose as good earnings reports from a range of companies boosted the market after three days of declines.】

item.title: Northvolt 下岗工人被日立能源抢购一空
item.description: 日立能源公司正在从 Northvolt AB 公司招聘员工，因为这家资金短缺的电池制造商正在瑞典的工厂裁员约 1600 人。【原文：Hitachi Energy is hiring workers from Northvolt AB as the cash-strapped battery maker lays off about 1,600 people at its sites in Sweden.】

item.title: 埃尼集团向 KKR 出售生物精炼部门 Enilive 的股份以推动绿色发展
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）与 KKR & Co Inc 签署了一项协议，出售其生物精炼部门 Enilive 的少数股份，以推动其绿色转型。【原文：Eni SpA signed a deal with KKR & Co Inc to sell a minority stake in its biorefining unit Enilive in a push to finance its green transition.】

item.title: 因担心全球供应收紧，锌创 20 个月新高
item.description: 由于有迹象表明全球市场正在收紧，锌飙升至 20 个月来的最高点。【原文：Zinc surged to a 20-month high on signs that the global market is tightening up.】

item.title: Eramet 收购阿根廷青山锂矿项目
item.description: 法国矿业公司埃赫曼（Eramet SA）将回购青山控股集团（Tsingshan Holding Group Co.【原文：French miner Eramet SA will buy back Tsingshan Holding Group Co.’s stake in an Argentinian lithium project, marking a rare retreat for the Chinese conglomerate from an expansion beyond its core nickel business.】

item.title: 法国制造业信心降至四年来最低点
item.description: 由于生产和订单前景严重恶化，10 月份法国制造业信心意外跌至四年来的最低点。【原文：French manufacturing confidence unexpectedly plummeted to a four-year low in October due to a strongly worsening outlook for production and orders.】

item.title: 阿托斯债务计划在债权人接管前获得法院批准
item.description: Atos SE称，法国一家商业法院批准了其财务重组计划，为债权人在未来几个月内控制这家陷入困境的法国IT公司铺平了道路。【原文：Atos SE said a French commercial court approved its financial restructuring plan, paving the way for creditors to take control of the troubled French IT company in the coming months.】

item.title: 应用营养公司首次公开募股募集 2.04 亿美元，首次亮相伦敦
item.description: Applied Nutrition Plc 公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.575 亿英镑（2.04 亿美元）的资金，从而提振了伦敦低迷的资本市场，并为十年前创立这家蛋白质奶昔生产商的前脚手架工人带来了一笔意外之财。【原文：Applied Nutrition Plc raised £157.5 million ($204 million) in an initial public offering, lifting London’s sluggish capital market and delivering a windfall to the former scaffolder who founded the protein-shake maker a decade ago.】

item.title: 巴克莱交易员和交易商帮助税前利润超过预期
item.description: 由于近几个月来各类资产的波动性上升，巴克莱银行第三季度交易收入增加，从而推动了利润的增长。【原文：Barclays Plc profit was buoyed by an increase in trading revenue in the third quarter as it benefited from the uptick in volatility across asset classes in recent months.】

item.title: 云计算提供商 OVH 任命新首席执行官，启动 3.5 亿欧元回购计划
item.description: 法国云计算服务提供商OVHcloud宣布了新的首席执行官人选和3.5亿欧元（3.78亿美元）的股票回购计划，该公司正努力将自己打造成欧洲主要的云计算服务提供商。【原文：French cloud provider OVHcloud has announced a new chief executive officer and a €350 million ($378 million) share buyback as the company seeks to establish itself as a major European cloud provider.】
